TopicTitle: Most rewarding gaming experience for a long time :)

Articles.Content: Well, i had touch down. Unfortunately my game crashed while alt+tabbing to save the screenshot... So here is my capsule on the mun:

Congratulations!

Hey, whats that smart S.A.S. system there? Where\'d you get it?

Welcome to the forums!

-Drakomis

I remember the feeling of my first Mun landing. I\'ve done dozens in Orbiter but never completely manual and with actual terrain to land on. You\'re right, there\'s nothing quite like that feeling

Btw, did you know there\'s a build-in screenshot feature in KSP? Default key is F1. Might save you some trouble in the future

Now this we like to see, welcome to the forums mate. Enjoy yourself and have fun.

-DR

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
